channel.title: CVE Feed for Open Design Alliance -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Open Design Alliance -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5180|2024-08-02T07:52:07.647Z -- open%20design%20alliance -- oda%20drawings%20sdk%20-%20all%20versions%20%3C%202024.12
item.description: An issue was discovered in Open Design Alliance Drawings SDK before 2024.12. A corrupted value of number of sectors used by the Fat structure in a crafted DGN file leads to an out-of-bounds write. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-5179|2024-08-02T07:52:08.516Z -- open%20design%20alliance -- oda%20drawings%20sdk%20-%20all%20versions%20%3C%202024.10
item.description: An issue was discovered in Open Design Alliance Drawings SDK before 2024.10. A corrupted value for the start of MiniFat sector in a crafted DGN file leads to an out-of-bounds read. This can allow attackers to cause a crash, potentially enabling a denial-of-service attack (Crash, Exit, or Restart) or possible code execution.
